description:
At Walsh Woodard LLC, we have secured millions of dollars on behalf of victims of personal injury. Our law firm is based in West Hartford, Connecticut, and takes cases that involve matters such as the following:

  • Dangerous drugs and defective devices
  • Workplace accidents
  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Dog bites and premises liability
  • Legal, medical and professional malpractice
  • Wrongful death

The attorneys at our law firm bring more than 75 years of combined experience to our practice. They have earned accolades that include a "Superb" rating on Avvo and listings in The Best Lawyers in America and the National Association of Distinguished Counsel's Nation's Top One Percent. Several of our attorneys have been selected for inclusion in Connecticut Super Lawyers for multiple years, and The National Board of Trial Advocacy has certified several of our attorneys as civil trial specialists and advocates.

Our team puts people first. We make every accommodation we can in order to bring our clients peace of mind during an otherwise difficult time. Time and again, we return compensation to account for damages that include medical bills, property damage and other losses.

Walsh Woodard LLC offers free initial consultations. Our law firm also provides the opportunity for clients to meet with us virtually, such as over the phone or through the use of video conferencing.

The Best Lawyers in America 2013. Copyright 2012 by Woodward/White, Inc., Aiken, SC.
